title: How Did Posh People Deal With Quarantine? | StreetSmart
description: In this video, Max Fosh explores how wealthy individuals dealt with quarantine during the pandemic.
summary: Max Fosh investigates how affluent people coped with quarantine restrictions.
payoff: The video showcases the extravagant and often ridiculous ways posh individuals found loopholes to enjoy themselves during quarantine, highlighting the stark contrast between their experiences and those of the average person.
